questions.question_text: Which choices best describe what is necessary to create a custom horizontal pattern to discover an operating system that is not discovered by the base installation patterns? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
B and C

Selected Answer: BC
B and C.

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes the relationship between the Tomcat [cmdb_ci_app_server_tomcat] table and the Application Server [cdmb_ci_app_server] table? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Tomcat table extends the Application Server table
choices.A: Tomcat does not extend the Application Server table
choices.D: Tomcat table is a parent of the Application Server table
choices.C: Tomcat table is a child of the Application Server table

questions.question_text: In a discovery pattern, which types are available with CI Attributes in the Pattern Designer? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
B and C

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-operations-management/page/product/service-mapping/reference/r_PatternVariables.html#:~:text=There%20are%20several%20kinds%20of,attribute%20variables%2C%20and%20temporary%20variables.

questions.question_text: Which of the below choices are benefits of Tracked Configuration Files? (Choose two.)
Which choice best describes a Functionality Definition?

choices.A: Defines what CI identifiers to use.
choices.C: Defines what Behavior to use from a Discovery Schedule.
choices.D: Defines what protocols to detect from within a Behavior.
choices.B: Defines the IP addresses to discover.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-operations-management/page/product/discovery/task/create-disco-behavior.html

In the Discovery Functionality related list, click New.
Discovery Functionality defines what each MID Server in this behavior must do, specifically which protocols to detect.

Selected Answer: D
It should be D

Selected Answer: D
Answer is D
"pre-configured functionality that defines the protocol or list of protocols that each MID Server scans."
